website_summaries.verdict: This is a great stroller if you like the idea of facing baby toward you. Otherwise, consider other models we reviewed.
pros: Has a reversible seat that can be positioned to face forward or backward and offers 5 seating positions to fit a growing baby
cons: The wheels feel less substantial than others we reviewed
Not recommended for jogging or rugged terrain

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: If your baby's safety is important to you, I strongly advise to stay away from this stroller. Ours broke within 5 months of use. After reaching out to Amazon, the third company fulfilling the item and Baby Jogger we discovered the stroller was a very old model, (and apparently a defective one). Amazon and the third company refused to help us since it was more than 6 months from purchase, and overall very (!!) poor costumer service experience. We are buying a new stroller.
customer_reviews.author: assaf margalit

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller but heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this stroller for a few weeks and am pretty happy with it so far. I love that the seat is reversible. It has a great push and large basket. It's very easy to fold. The main things we do not like is that it is heavy and somewhat awkward to unfold.
customer_reviews.author: BCN Mama

customer_reviews.title: Wheels lock constantly
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this stroller a 1 star because the front wheels constantly lock so that they do not turn. This happens every few steps and basically renders the stroller useless. We had one of the wheels replaced already and it does the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Yancey

customer_reviews.title: So far great stroller. Have only been using for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: So far great stroller. Have only been using for a few weeks now. One thing I have noticed is that it seems 3 out of 4 of the wheels are slightly oval instead of round. Makes the whole stroller bump when going over a smooth surface. Need to contact support about. Hopefully they can deal with quickly.. will update.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price great quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing stroller this was the second stroller we bought since the birth of our daughter. Hands down we regret not purchasing this stroller from the very beginning 8 months ago. Great stroller as your child grows.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky to open and a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new stroller. I love the canopy and I love the size of the basket underneath. It's a little heavy and awkward to carry that's why only 4 stars. It's very smooth and easy to push though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller!!!! I am so happy I decided to buy this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: ... have 4 strollers by far this one is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 strollers by far this one is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I haven't use it yet, but I can say ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use it yet, but I can say that it is what I expected! I choose this brand and model because I use to walk with my dogs daily !
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this one instead of City Select and its great for our 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one instead of City Select and its great for our 18 month old. the seat is taller and more comfortable than the city select. we tested both out in store. feels very sturdy when pushing and smooth. wheels are meant to absorb bumps which was a plus. its is heavy, but that's not a big deal for us. i wanted something that will last and hold up for a few years and this seems to be it. its a fairly new model so i assume they will add more accessories to pair with it. if they do, then i'll bump this up to a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Had all the features I wanted but it was SO HEAVY. Almost twice the weight of others Baby Jogger makes. I ultimately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Worth the money! Pros: -telescoping handle bar for super tall husband -extendable leg rest for long legged kids -huge under basket -rubber wheels make a super smooth ride -tight turn radius -high quality materials that seem like they will last -front or rear facing seat-easy to switch back and forth -hand brake is awesome -easy one hand collapse -will collapse with the seat on (both when it's rear or front facing) Cons: -when you collapse is doesn't self stand -not thrilled with the car seat attachments. Works, but could work better. -wish it had a better option for parent console to hold beverages and phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Jogger City Premier Stroller | Baby Stroller with Reversible Seat, 5 Riding Options | Quick Fold Lightweight Stroller, Teal/Black
product_meta.description: Explore the world together! The City Premier stroller delivers flexibility with a reversible seat - baby can face you for interaction, or face forward to discover the world. Attach an infant car seat, pram, or glider board to create 5 different riding options for your growing sidekick! Not all strollers come with these signature features like easy one-hand compact fold, lightweight and durable wheels, and the extended, full coverage UV50+ canopy make your everyday adventures effortless. The baby stroller has a telescoping handlebar with hand brake keep you comfortable and in control. Add-on accessories allow for easy customization of your City Premier so you're equipped to go anywhere.
feature_bullets: 5 stroller riding options for infant to toddler; reversible seat to face mom or world; reversible memory foam insert provides two stylish color options
One-hand, compact fold with baby stroller seat on, in either direction; auto-lock is automatically engaged with one-hand fold, includes carry strap
Large wheels are lightweight and durable; all-wheel suspension and locking front swivel wheels give mom control. Stroller Weight: 28.5 Pounds, Stroller Height: 39.8 - 41.7 inches
Seat features extended UV 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo window and multiple recline positions; rotating and height adjustable footwell; 5-point stroller harness for safety; holds child up to 50 lb.
Telescoping handle provides height adjustment; hand brake keeps controls close; large storage basket provides space for baby's extras

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
